title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Sets New Record With $3.8 Billion In Trading Volume
description: The ten spot Bitcoin ETFs experienced $10 billion in combined trading day volume.

title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs set trading volume record amid BTC price high
description:
U.S.-based Bitcoin ETFs saw $10 billion in trading volume on March 5, beating last week's $7.7 billion record.

The United States spot Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded funds (ETF) had a record $10 billion in trading volume on March 5 as Bitcoin notched a new all-time high before it plummeted around 12% over the next five hours.

“These are bananas numbers for ETFs under [two months] old,” Bloomberg ETF analyst Eric Balchunas said in a March 5 X post reporting the figures.

Bitcoin analyst Alessandro Ottaviani posted a slightly lower trading volume of $9.58 billion for the funds — which still beat the previous record of $7.7 billion set on Feb. 28.

Read more

title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs record $10 billion in daily volume, breaking previous record
description:
Spot Bitcoin ETFs have continued their record-breaking performance this week, recording over $10 billion in volume on March 5 — the highest since their launch in January. title: Binance Discontinues All Services for Nigerian Naira After Employees Detained by Government and Threatened With Fine
description:
Binance, the world’s largest crypto exchange by trading volume is discontinuing support for the largest economy in Africa’s national currency. Late last week, the government of Nigeria demanded nearly $10 billion from Binance, alleging that the crypto exchange manipulated the exchange rate of its fiat currency. According to local reports, the Nigerian government slapped Binance with […]

The post Binance Discontinues All Services for Nigerian Naira After Employees Detained by Government and Threatened With Fine appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
